Description: Ostracon, large fragment (2 sections comprising 5 and 2 pieces) of a dark-red pottery jar, the fabric is relatively coarse, the interior is covered in places with lumps of a grey-brown granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of at least eleven lines of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Thoth 'Great of 5' Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393498) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393498)
